metadata.title: CVE-2018-5360 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
LibTIFF before 4.0.6 mishandles the reading of TIFF files, as demonstratedby a heap-based buffer over-read in the ReadTIFFImage function incoders/tiff.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.27.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
